citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on 08-
APR-22. A household member stated the licensee was not at home and not available for inspection.
End Section
